title: Mindfulness Meditation
description: Sit comfortably; focus on breath; when attention wanders, gently return. Aim for non-judgmental awareness.

title: Working Memory Training (n-back)
description: Use n-back style recall. Start with 1-back: say when current item matches the previous item. Increase difficulty gradually.

title: Aerobic Exercise
description: Run, cycle, or brisk walk. Keep moderate intensity where you can talk but not sing.

title: HIIT
description: Alternate 40s fast / 20s easy for 12 minutes. Warm up and cool down briefly.

title: Sleep Optimization
description: Set a fixed sleep and wake time; dark, cool room; no screens 60 minutes before bed.

title: Intermittent Fasting (12–16h)
description: Choose a daily eating window. Stay hydrated and avoid if contraindicated.

title: Learn a New Language
description: Practice vocabulary, grammar, and speaking daily with a short session.

title: Musical Instrument Practice
description: Practice scales, rhythm, and a song; focus on deliberate practice.

title: Dual Tasking Walk
description: Walk while doing mental math or reciting poetry to engage working memory and attention.

title: Reflective Journaling
description: Write about your day, decisions, and lessons learned; end with one improvement for tomorrow.

title: Rule-Switching Game
description: Create a task where the rule changes mid-way (e.g., clap on red, snap on blue, then swap).

title: Non-Dominant Hand Practice
description: Use your non-dominant hand for brushing teeth, unlocking phone, or short writing practice.

title: 30-Second Creativity Burst
description: List 5 new uses for a common object (spoon, brick, paperclip) under a time limit.

title: Predictive Observation
description: Silently predict the next actions of people nearby (e.g., 'she’ll check her phone next').

title: Story Forking
description: Tell a story and change the plot every 20 seconds; keep it coherent.

title: Cold Exposure + Mental Task
description: Hold ice or take a cold shower while recalling a list or doing mental math. Stop if uncomfortable.

title: Reverse Habits
description: Change the order of routines (breakfast after walk; read before phone).

title: Micro-Adventure Route
description: Take an unfamiliar path home; notice 5 novel details.

title: Silent Digital Detox
description: Set a 30–60 minute window of complete silence and no screens.

title: Constraint Writing
description: Write 8 sentences without the letter 'e' or with exactly 5 words per sentence.

title: Blind Contour Drawing
description: Draw an object without looking at the paper; focus on lines and edges.

title: Music Layer Tracking
description: Listen to a song and track two instruments separately in your mind.

title: DIY Synesthesia
description: Assign colors to numbers/letters; visualize them while reading or counting.

title: Guided Visualization Walk
description: Imagine walking through your home where each door opens into a new landscape.

title: Opposite-View Debate
description: Argue against your own opinion on a topic; aim for a strong steelman case.

title: Design a Ritual
description: Invent a personal ritual (morning cue, mantra, gesture) and perform it deliberately.

title: Dream Journal
description: Record dreams upon waking; note emotions, places, patterns.

title: Improv 'Yes, And...'
description: Do solo improv: speak aloud, never negating—always add ('yes, and...').

title: Yoga + Breath Counting
description: Hold simple poses while counting breaths to 10; reset when you lose track.

title: Martial Flow (Shadow)
description: Slow shadow boxing or Tai Chi flow; focus on controlled transitions.

title: Dance Pattern Memory
description: Create a 6–8 step dance pattern and repeat it from memory.

title: Balance + Recite
description: Stand on one leg while reciting numbers backward from 50.

title: Bouldering/Climbing Problem
description: Attempt an easy bouldering route; plan moves before execution.

title: Primal Movements
description: Bear crawls, crab walks, and frog hops in a short circuit.

title: tDCS Session (PFC montage)
description: Only if trained/cleared medically. Low current stimulation over dlPFC during tasks.

title: Neurofeedback
description: Use a consumer EEG for attention training protocols if available.

title: VR Cognitive Game
description: Use immersive VR puzzle/attention apps for added PFC load.

title: Psychedelic-Assisted Mindfulness
description: Only where legal and medically supervised. Aim is to reset maladaptive loops.

title: Hyperoxygenation Breathing
description: Cyclic deep breathing with brief retention; stop if dizzy.

title: Novelty Food Day
description: Eat only new foods you rarely consume; note sensory experiences.

title: Consistent Sleep/Wake
description: Set fixed times; anchor with morning light exposure.

title: Omega-3 Intake
description: Include fish, flaxseed, or walnuts daily/weekly as per diet.

title: Dark Chocolate (70%+)
description: Enjoy a small square mindfully; avoid late-night caffeine.

title: Green Tea Focus
description: Use L-theanine + caffeine synergy for calm focus.

title: Deep Social Conversation
description: Have a meaningful chat about values/decisions instead of small talk.

title: Volunteering Act
description: Do one helpful act; reflect on impact.

title: Nature Attention Walk
description: Walk in nature; note 5 sights, 5 sounds, 5 textures.
